Detailed Description

ImageRef is used to encapsulate functionality for handing over information about an image or for loading an image from the filesystem.
See also:
MediaRef

Image * ImageRef::GetImage (  BOOLEAN  buffer_to_ram = TRUE  ) 
 

If the member containing the image is already initialized it returns the pointer to this image, otherwise it loads the image from its associated file by use of a FileBinData object.
